DOC.brief_summary: The study will assess the clinical and laboratory data of about 100 pediatric patients diagnosed and treated at the Pediatric Hematology Unit during the years 1980 until 2007 because of thrombotic events. The results, the treatment given, and the outcome of the patients will be summarized.
DOC.brief_title: Thrombophilic Risk Factors in Pediatric Patients Diagnosed at the Ha'Emek Medical Center
DOC.criteria: All the patients diagnosed since 1980. Patients with insufficient data records.
